root.name: Jack Houston and the Necronauts
root.description: KickstarterThis game was successfully funded by a kickstarter campaign in August 2012, raising a total op $64K.StoryThe story tells of the spacepilot Jack Houston, who ends up on a hostile planet after a failed mission to Venus. His adventure is to survive and discover the true nature of the planet and it's inhabitants that feed of dead creatures.The setting in the game will be based upon the popular sci-fi magazine art in the 1940s and 1950s.
